short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jelly Match 3 is a simple match 3 game, tap screen to drag and drop the jelly to get high score.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jelly Match 3 is a delightful and engaging mobile game that brings the classic match-3 gameplay to a whole new level of fun and excitement. Designed for players of all ages, this simple yet addictive game revolves around the colorful and wobbly world of jellies. With a user-friendly interface and easy-to-grasp mechanics, Jelly Match 3 offers a relaxing and entertaining gaming experience.

The objective of the game is straightforward: players must tap the screen to drag and drop jellies, matching three or more of the same color to score points. As the jellies come in various shapes and sizes, players will find themselves immersed in a visually appealing and dynamic environment. The vibrant hues of the jellies, coupled with smooth animations, create a visually stimulating atmosphere that captivates the player from the first touch.
